DOC.brief_summary: In study investigator analyze influence smoking , benzodizepine use , obesity among patient severe Obstructive Sleep Apnea ( sOSA ) .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Smoking , Benzodiazepine ( BZD ) Use Obesity Severe Obstructive Sleep Apnea ( sOSA )
DOC.detailed_description: This study retrospective study . Patients enrol : patient PSG ( polysomnography ) 1st January 2014 30th June 2015 . First analysis : influence smoking , benzodiazepine use , obesity AHI ( Apnea Hypopnea Index : number apnea hypopnea per hour sleep ) . Second analysis : among patient sOSA : influence smoking , benzodiazepine use , obesity sleep fragmentation night oximetry .
DOC.criteria: All patient register overnight PSG Clinique SaintLuc Bouge
